parameters.name: GlobalInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the distributed instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return each page.

parameters.name: SubInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the child instance that is attached to the distributed instance.
